member.name: M:Codecool.ProcessWatch.Controller.ProcessWatchApplication.SelectProcessesByName(System.Int32,System.Int32,System.String)
member.summary: Selects Processes that contain the search string.

member.name: M:Codecool.ProcessWatch.Controller.ProcessWatchApplication.SelectProcessesStartBeforeDate(System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Nullable{System.Int32},System.Nullable{System.Int32},System.Nullable{System.Int32},System.Nullable{System.Int32},System.Nullable{System.Int32})
member.summary: Select Processes Start before given date. All arguments with date are optional (no given argument will be set for current DateTime).
member.returns: Tuple (Number of pages, Current page of List of MemoryItemProcess)

member.summary: Select Processes Start after given date. All arguments with date are optional (no given argument will be set for current DateTime).
member.returns: Tuple (Number of pages, Current page of List of MemoryItemProcess)

member.summary: Select Processes starts at given day
member.returns: Tuple (Number of pages, Current page of List of MemoryItemProcess)

member.summary: Select Processes starts at given month.

member.summary: Select Physical Memory Usage greater than given memory in MB.
